reviews.review:
With every update this game just gets wrose. 
Hitboxes are complete bs, players who troll and fuck with their team mates don't get punished and camping and tunneling is "an allowed strategy" for killers. Even though it completely ruins the fun for survivors. 

Some changes are understandable. Some are not. I really loved the game when it first came out. They made some improvements. But with the last few updates this game only makes one rage either about teammates, who fuck up the whole game on purpose or about hitboxes that are all over the place. Some hits that obviously missed count, while some that should be hits do not count.

It's sad because I used to love playing this game.... Instead of pumping out new DLCs with new Killers, Survivours and Maps the devs should focus on improving the fundamentals of the game to make it more fun again.
This game is so much fun, and I really enjoy it!

버그나 비매너 이용자를 제외하고 게임만 평가하면 진짜 가성비 대비 갓겜이라고 생각합니다.  그래픽도 나쁘지 않은 편이고,  구성도  나름  괜찮은 편! 6개월 500시간하고 있는데 지금까지 질리지 않고 잘 하고 있습니다. 물론 패치때 마다 생기는 버그들, 버그에 대한 조치가 느리다는 점만 빼면 좋아요. 예비 데린이 분들 할일할떄 만원 주고 살 가치가 있으니 어서 오시죠.  만약 이 평가들을 데발진들이 본다면 한국인 이용자가 상당히 많은 편이니 정식적으로 모든 부분에 대해 한글화를 해줬으면 좋겠다고 말하고 싶네요.

This is my first steam review for a game ever. Do not buy this game, it's an unbalanced piece of crap. The killer is hopelessly outmatched and against any survivor with a clue will get the run around.

I've put in enough hours I feel to guage this shit show of a game is just a waste of time.

If you enjoy chasing 4 individuals around and having them blind you non stop with flashlights, or chase them around small loops endlessly, or have them completely unafraid of you in every way, this is the game for you.
PRETY GOOD JOB SO FARRRR
Best game ever!

Allora questo gioco non ha problemi e di per se un problema il gioco all'inzio gli avevo pure dato una valutazione positiva, ma ormai il gioco fa veramente schifo ci sono sempre gli stessi task il gioco non è per niente divertente ,se non giocato in premade.
il gioco come idea iniziale era carino ormai ci sono troppe cose che il gioco ha come problemi:
-sempre lo stesso task da survivor ripara il generatore di per se all'inzio l'idea è bella, però dovrebbero implementare più task ; ad esempio prendi la benzina e portala al generatore cose cosi ...
-i pallet ormai mi danno sui nervi,anche se abbassi il pallet  hai la probabilità quasi certa di essere colpito dato ormai l'effetto void implementato dagli sviluppatori e potrei ancora continuare a parlarne.
-i killer hanno poteri copiati uno dall'altro
-gli sviluppatori preferiscono aggiungere nuove cose invece di sistemare le vecchie cose come bug glitch ecc.
-gli sviluppatori non sono per niente affidabili dicono una cosa e non la fanno mai ad esempio i server dedicati gli avevano promessi da molto tempo dicendo che entro l'estate gli avrebbero messi. Lo hanno fatto? La risposta è no e siamo già alla fine di settembre e niente ;e pensando di far contenti i fan o almeno placarli;e attrare gente nuova hanno inserito Il Demogorgone invece di aggiungere server dedicati e risolvere Bug
-Il gioco non è per niente bilanciato
-gli sviluppatori cercano di trarre più profitto dal gioco fregandosi proprio del gioco e rendendolo così poco competitivo dato che il gioco non è bilanciato per niente.


Ora come ora il gioco non vi consiglio di scaricarlo e di cercare magari un altro gioco migliore,mi dispiace dirlo ma io questo gioco in un futuro molto vicino non lo vedo per nulla bene ora come ora e spero un giorno magari di cambiare idea a riguardo. Spero che migliorino questi Problemi gravi che affligono il gioco anche se credo che non lo faranno mai.

An sich ist DBD ein Spiel, das über Stunden Unterhaltung bietet und Spaß macht. Wäre die gesamte Community (Killer & Survivor) nicht dermaßen toxic. Es gibt bei den Killern kaum noch Spieler, die fair sind, nicht campen, tunneln oder sluggen. Bei den Survivern gibt es zu viele Teabagger und Antimates. Hier müssen die Devs von Seiten des Spiels aus nachbessern, damit diese Spieler die Lust an unfairem spielen verlieren (wie auch immer das aussehen soll).

Gerade für neue Spieler wird es schwer sein reinzufinden, da Rank 1 Killer sich absichtlich deranken, nur um gegen "Noob" Survivor anzutreten und sie zur Strecke zu bringen. Dennoch empfehle ich dieses Spiel, da es selbst mit den wenigen, fairen, Ausnahmen süchtig macht und man den ganzen Tag mit dem Reparieren von Generatoren verbringen kann ;)

Dead by Daylight community and developers in 1 minute video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u8jaeBlagxI
Don't start playing this game, I warned you.

Игра норм, геймплей интересный, прокачка занимательная, если играть с друзьями, особенно фулл командой, то игры хватит на очень долгое время, но... играть почти невозможно по той простой причине что крюки, которые являются одним из 2-ух путей победы маньяка, находятся не просто в обилии. Их не дохрена, а  ДОХРЕНИЩЕ. Если вас повалил маньяк, то будьте уверены, что через 5 метров, в лучшем и самом редком для вас случае через 15 метров, он уже вывесит вашу тушку на всеобщее обозрение. Крюки  можно ломать: либо перком - долго, либо инструментами - жалко, а знаете почему? Смысла почти нет. Они регенятся через какое то не продолжительное время. Черт побери, крюк регенятся даже если испортился по причине жертвоприношения. Думаете баланс? Я так не думаю, потому что для "баланса" они поставили 4 бесмертных крюка в подвале маньяка, которых хватит на одновременный показ мод сразу всех некогда выживших. Не думаю, что с крюками что-то сделают, но если их колличество урежут, то я сразу изменю свой отзыв.
В этой игре оптимизация убивает хуже любых убийц.10 pretty good job/10

Сначала игра встретит тебя 3 хорошими катками с понимающими тимейтами, а потом когда ты хотя-бы раз апнеш ранг! Ты будешь готов 0T$0$@ть Х¥√ за то что бы тебе попался адекватный маньяк или не токсичный выживший 
Рекомендую только потому что она затягивает конкретно

Dead by Daylight macht mir sehr viel Spaß weil jedes spiel anders abläuft, ein manko sind die Killer die campen aber es gibt auch runden die ohne auskommen und die machen dann sehr viel Spaß. Vor allem für Adrenalinjunkies ist das spiel perfekt :D. Im ganzen ist Dead by Daylight ein sehr geiles Game. EDIT: Der Fehler wurde behoben und es kommt sogar noch mehr Inhalt auf uns zu ALSO KLARE EMPFEHLUNG.

我对这个游戏有两点建议：首先，幸存者、屠夫在线等级合并，游戏应该采用5人匹配其中1人随机屠夫的模式，避免建房等待时间！其次，工厂、农场、深林、车库大类的旧地图数量多，导致新地图出现几率偏低，建议各大类地图平均机率出现。

my first review Posted: Dec 16, 2017 @ 5:18pm

updated 7/18/20

this game is 90% leechers.. i played for like 6 hours stright and  over 20 games not a single player helpped me start a generator!
this game use to be fun when players helped there team! now they just hide the whole time.


updated 7/18/20

over 805 hours

so I really really and I mean Really wanted to like this game!!!

If you can handle the most toxic player base of any game i ever played in my 40 years of gaming.

the game is so one sided to the killers. 
as a killer playing 20 games i will usually get 3 hooks the 4th player gets away because they are hatch camping and left their team to die.

if you try to leave 3rd player down and go after the hatch camper then you get cussed out at end of game.

the Devs update just makes the game more one sided every update.

for example when a killer was targeting a certain player in game direct stab perk saved you from him tunneling. they took it away and made it only last like 20 seconds
so all the killer as to do is wait 20 seconds to to put you on the hook and bam your perk slot is wasted.

if you're rock as the killer people will just  drop out of the game so you don't get points for the hook.

rage quits are common for players who refuse to play against killers such as Doc, or wraith.

the instant they see doc they drop out of the game, which in turn screws all the rest of the players in the game.

the only way this game is fun is IF you are playing with 3 friends all on discord or teamspeak and you will risk your self to help team. but then at that point you all the fun is gone because killer has not much a shot.

if its just random the killer wins most of the time unless he gets the toxic disconnect  players.


like i said the player base is the most toxic i have ever seen.

「煽り耐性がある方にだけオススメします」

このゲームには成長要素があります。
つまり、成長する間はずっと弱者側となり、成長するまで煽りに耐えなければなりません。

生存者側もキラー側も煽られます。
キラー側でプレイした時の、生存者側の煽りは毎ゲームのようにあります。民度は超低い。

レベルが上がり、パークが揃い出すと強者側になりますので面白くなります。

レベルが上がるまでの煽りプレイに耐えられる人へのみオススメします。
そうでない人は、イライラするだけのゲームです。オススメしません。
